# VisionError.unsupportedRequest(_:)

**Case**

An error that indicates an app attempts a request the framework doesn’t support.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupportedRequest(String)
```

## Getting the unsupported error

- **VisionError.unsupportedComputeDevice(_:)**: An error that indicates an app requests a compute device the framework doesn’t support.
- **VisionError.unsupportedComputeStage(_:)**: An error that indicates an app requests a compute stage the framework doesn’t support.
- **VisionError.unsupportedRevision(_:)**: An error that indicates an app specifies a request revision the framework doesn’t support.
